attributes.action: Following the EU referendum mess, HOLD A GENERAL ELECTION BEFORE DECEMBER 2016
attributes.background: Following the EU referendum, resignation of Mr Cameron, vote of no confidence for Mr Corbyn, the resulting country in crisis, & the Conservative party forcing upon us a PM we would never vote for, a General Election must take place by Dec 2016.  LET THE PEOPLE DECIDE WHO CAN GUIDE US THROUGH BREXIT
